attr.title: Submachine: Legacy
attr.desc:
Submachine is a hand-drawn puzzle adventure game . You will find yourself in a vast network of desolate locations containing puzzles, secrets, notes and items to collect to help you along the way.

Special thanks to Jeod for helping me to make this port.
Also thanks to Mateusz Skutnik for making this awesome game.

Controls :
X = Interact | L1 = Menu | R1 = Inventory | D-Pad = Move | Stick = Move cursor
attr.inst:
Purchase the game on Steam. 

Download it and copy over options.ini, data.win and the vault folder from the game files [they should be located in "C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/submachine"] into "ports/submachinelegacy/assets/"
